Text:
This works I burned it on pc using TransMac then booted on the mac, however its not english its swedish or something.

It is bootable but is there a way to get it in english?
can someone please tell me how to boot this from cd using a slot loading imac g3 with a new hard drive. Thanks, hectorgraham, 2006-04-07.

1. Turn computer on
2. press down the "c" key untill you see the grey screen
3. Release the "c" key
4. Watch it boot off the cd
This is in Swedish though, right?
Will this work on an 040 Mac, or is it PowerPC only?
